about_the_game:
This is a sandbox based game that allows players to define character attributes, interact with various NPCS in real time, and explore the feature-rich adventure map and turn-based combat. And along with the development of the game to join different styles of Xiuxian Zongmen, starting from the disciple of the outer gate to hold the gate authority, the whole party; In the process of crossing borders and breaking ranks, he gradually promotes the development of the story, reveals the truth of the changes in heaven and earth, and influences the fate of the game world through his own choices.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1. Open and free exploration experience

The game has been launched in the Ancient Wilderness and Tianyuan State two large maps, which contain rich exploration elements. Players can not only worship the Zen door to learn skills to promote the position, but also can walk between towns, improve strength, relax; Scattered villages publish commissions and evolve dynamically as the game progresses; Hidden copy of the secret world is also a good place to challenge strong enemies and obtain treasures.



2. Real and interesting relationship interaction

As NPC interaction systems continue to be enriched and improved, players will have the opportunity to have more stories with strangers in the game world. You can maintain a light nodding acquaintance with them, sit and talk together, exchange what you need, bargaining for a little spiritual stone; Can also take the initiative to attack, around mercy, find a friend with the heart; Or simply commit crimes, steal and provoke others, and enjoy the pleasures of full sexual freedom.



3. A huge library of stories

Production group for the fruu Xiufairy world configuration of a clear and coherent main story task, in the main line process did not set toe to the place also prepared nearly 300 random events, 30 side plot for everyone to explore and experience, and all kinds of NPC have a variety of interaction. Game story text volume will reach 200,000 words or so, enough to allow players to experience the world in practice.



4.Informative feature gameplay

With the unremitting efforts of the entire production team, the town gameplay content in the game has been greatly expanded. The Alchemy Workshop, tavern, Brothel and other buildings have a lot of new levels and story content, more branches are opening, new NPCS and stories are waiting for you to explore and experience; The forging workshop has been rekindled and the equipment forging system is officially online. The spirit beast in the Colosseum is ready for players to place their big bets.



5. It's a whole new combat experience

Brand new five major sect swords, gourds, treasure banners, treasure mirrors, and demon pills. Under the new turn-based combat framework, players can freely match skills, independently set the release sequence to form output combo, and fully enjoy the fun of defeating the enemy. The types of enemies, the number of monsters, and the battle scenes in the battle dungeon have been greatly expanded in order to ensure the differentiation and freshness of the battle process to the greatest extent. Break through the gameplay and join various battles. The golden core needs to overcome the calamity, and the foundation building can fly with the sword. The world of cultivating immortals is waiting for you to experience. Brand new five major sect swords, gourds, treasure banners, treasure mirrors, and demon pills. Under the new turn-based combat framework, players can freely match skills, independently set the release sequence to form output combo, and fully enjoy the fun of defeating the enemy. The types of enemies, the number of monsters, and the battle scenes in the battle dungeon have been greatly expanded in order to ensure the differentiation and freshness of the battle process to the greatest extent. Break through the gameplay and join various battles. The golden core needs to overcome the calamity, and the foundation building can fly with the sword. The world of cultivating immortals is waiting for you to experience.



6. Clan play method for position promotion

In the design of the sect system in this book, only the lowest level disciples will be assigned to deal with chores. With the promotion of the position, the players will have more rights and participate in the development and construction of the sect, from disciple management and task assignment to sect conflict and power expansion, and fully experience the fun of operation and management. In the world of cultivating immortals, there are not only fighting and killing, but also worldly wisdom.

highlighted.name: Clouds and rain over the Witch Mountain
Eliminate demons and defend the Dao

detailed_description:
discord

name: Floating Life2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64位或以上
  • Processor: Intel Core i3或以上
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Grahics Series
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1920*1080或同比例分辨率
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64位或以上
  • Processor: Intel Core i5或以上
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT520或以上
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1920*1080或同比例分辨率

short_description: Floating Life2 is a sandbox fairy quest where you interact with NPCS in real time and experience the ups and downs of fairy quest together. Join xiuxian Zong Gate, experience the rich adventure map and real-time combat, gradually discover the truth of the earth and earth changes, change your fate.
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, English, Japanese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
